source:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
A new rumor has the dwarves of Komra in a right tizzy.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_SEQ_00<tab>Der tratschende Zwerg möchte mir dir sprechen. Hoffentlich ist es kein Tratsch.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_SEQ_01<tab>

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the dig site watch.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the dig site chief.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Anogg.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_03<tab>Search for the automaton core.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the automaton core to Anogg.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_05<tab>Search for the mining lantern.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the mining lantern to the dig site chief.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_07<tab>Speak with the gossipy dwarf.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_23<tab>

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_001<tab>You heard the latest rumor out of Komra? The strangest find in recent memory, though actual details as to what said find actually is have yet to emerge.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_001<tab>Hast du schon gehört? In einem der Stollen drüben in Komra hat man eine wichtige Entdeckung gemacht. Flüstert man zumindest, gerüchteweise.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_002<tab>If you do happen to come into any juicy tidbits, I'd be keen to hear 'em. The suspense is killing me here...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_002<tab>Ich würde doch wirklich zu gerne wissen, ob's stimmt, und vor allem, was da entdeckt wurde. Kannst du mal nachsehen und mir danach berichten? Ich muss es einfach wissen!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_003<tab>Remember: I'm the one what put you on the scent! So if you learn any exciting secrets, you'd best share them with me! 'Tis only fair!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_003<tab>Hast du rausgefunden, ob das Gerücht stimmt? Welches? Na, dass man in Komra eine wichtige Entdeckung gemacht hat. Das hab ich dir doch erzählt!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_050<tab>I can neither confirm nor deny the existence of a new discovery of untold value that only a select few are allowed to see for themselves.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_050<tab>Halt! Der Zutritt zum Stollen ist verboten. Da wurde nämlich eine seeehr wichtige Entdeckung gemacht.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_051<tab>That said...there may come a time when I find myself utterly fascinated by that pile of rocks over there and would be completely oblivious to anyone attempting to sneak past...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_051<tab>Allerdings ... könnte ich dich vielleicht reinlassen, wenn du einen <var 1A 02 /var>gewichtigen<var 1A 01 /var> Grund hast. <hüstel>

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_052<tab>...
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_053<tab>...You're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of the world, ain't you? Don't make me say it plain.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_053<tab>Du verstehst doch, was ich meine, oder? Etwa nicht?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_054<tab>Wicked white! How bloody stupid are you!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_054<tab>Bei meinem Bart, du hast aber eine lange Leitung!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_055<tab>You─the imbecile─give me─the guard─ten thousand gil. Then you─the imbecile─get to walk past me─the guard─and see the amazing find. Got it?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_055<tab>Jetzt mal im Klartext: Rück zehntausend<var 1D /var>- du hast richtig gehört: <var 1A 02 /var>zehntausend<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>- Gil an die Sonne und ich guck mal kurz in die falsche Richtung. Ist doch nicht so schwer zu kapieren, oder?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q1_000_000<tab>Bribe the guard?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_057<tab>Then you do not get to pass. You go away! Good day, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_057<tab>Nein? Dann kommst du hier auch nicht rein. So einfach ist das!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_058<tab>Heh heh, about time you started playing by the rules...
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_059<tab>Lali-what in the blazing hells do you think you're doing man-ho!? Is that any way for a guard to behave? Is it!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_059<tab>Was machst du denn da!!! Du bist hier, um auf den Stollen aufzupassen! Nicht, um dich unlauter zu bereichern! Das gehört sich nicht.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_060<tab>N-N-No sir, Chief! Sir!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_061<tab>No rations for you tonight!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_061<tab>Zur Strafe gehst du heute Abend ohne Essen ins Bett!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_062<tab>Chief, no! Mercy! Meeeeeercy!

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_063<tab>It's...<sniffle>...it's not fair, I tell you... A dwarf toils day in and day out for a pittance, only to try and make a little something extra on the side, and what does it get him... <sob>
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_063<tab><schnief> ... Wie gemein ... Mich so zu quälen. Wenn ich doch nur etwas wohlhabender wäre, wie mein Cousin, dann könnte ich mir die Plackerei hier sparen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_064<tab>Right, well, anyway─bugger off. None may pass without the Chief's permission, which I know you haven't got.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_064<tab>Also, du hast es gehört. Hier ist Zutritt verboten. Wenn du rein willst, musst du mit dem Vorarbeiter sprechen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_065<tab>Oh look, it's the sinner who cost me my dinner. Go hassle the chief if you want to go in, 'cause I sure as hells ain't letting you pass.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_065<tab>Was denn? Hier ist <var 1A 02 /var>Zutritt verboten<var 1A 01 /var>. Wenn du rein willst, musst du mit dem Vorarbeiter sprechen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_070<tab>No time for you, friend. We've our hands full with this latest find of ours...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_070<tab>Hier wurde eine sehr wichtige Entdeckung gemacht. Also habe ich einen Stollenwächter aufgestellt, damit er aufpasst und keinen reinlässt.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_100<tab>Wait, wait, don't tell me. I assume you came all this way to put in for the position? Sorry, but it's already been filled.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_100<tab>Ach so. Bist du vielleicht zum Arbeiten hier? Tut mir leid, alle freien Stellen sind besetzt.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_001<tab>Came all this way for the what-now?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_002<tab>You know what they say about assumptions...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_002<tab>Was ist denn in diesem Stollen?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_102<tab>Eh? Don't go playing silly buggers with me. The queer ruins we found deep in a cavern through a tunnel over there! The one filled with all kinds of machina? To the point we've started calling it a bloody machina graveyard?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_102<tab>Ob du es glaubst oder nicht: In diesem Stollen hat man alte Ruinen gefunden. Überreste von Maschinen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_103<tab>Yes, well, we were looking to hire on another guard, but the position's since been filled by that fellow what tried to swindle you a moment ago.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_103<tab>Also haben wir uns entschlossen, ein paar Experten anzuheuern, die sich damit auskennen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_104<tab>So you're out of luck, I'm afraid. But chin up, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Your time'll come round again soon enough.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_104<tab>Ich bin mir sicher, dass wir mit diesen Maschinen ordentlich Gil verdienen können. Ich höre sie schon klingeln. Die Gil, nicht die Maschinen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_105<tab>Since you're here and still unemployed, mind delivering a message for me? It's for two younglings in Komra, Anogg and Konogg─sister and brother, twins. Fond of wearing white and black. Twin thing, I suppose.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_105<tab>Ach, da fällt mir ein<var 1D /var>... Kannst du vielleicht etwas für mich erledigen? Im Dorf gibt es zwei Zwillingsgeschwister, Anogg und Konogg. Ich habe eine Nachricht für sie.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_100_105<tab>The message is as follows: “Lali-bleeding-ho! This is no place for children to be messing about! Stay far, far, far away, or else!” Got it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_100_105„BLEIBT WEG! DER STOLLEN IST KEIN SPIELPLATZ!“
Das wäre alles.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_110<tab>If I told you several times before you're not getting in, what makes you think I've since changed my mind? I mean, think about it...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_110<tab>Tut mir leid, aber hier ist Zutritt verboten!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_115<tab>Anogg and Konogg, wearing white and black. You'll know 'em when you see 'em. And don't forget the lali-bleeding-ho!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_115<tab>Bitte, bring meine Nachricht zu Anogg und Konogg. Es ist sehr wichtig.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_150<tab>Hm? You got business with us?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_100_150<tab>...The chief put you up to this? And you <var 1A 02 /var>agreed<var 1A 01 /var>? Haven't you got anything better to do with your time?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_100_150<tab>Eine Nachricht vom Vorarbeiter? Tut mir leid, aber wir haben gerade Wichtigeres zu tun.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_151<tab>Wait...those garments...that quiet confidence...those powerful neck muscles sculpted by a lifetime of nodding...
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_152<tab>(This is that sinner everyone's been talking about, Sister! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s the guileless fool we've been waiting for! The perfect patsy!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_152<tab>Du, Anogg. Von <var 08 E905 ((der Nichtzwergin)) ((dem Nichtzwerg)) /var> habe ich schon gehört. Gerüchteweise. Wir können <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((ihn)) /var> bestimmt zu unserem Vorteil einsetzen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_153<tab>(Good thinking, Brother. Let's get right to it, then!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_153<tab>Guter Einfall. Du bist wirklich schlau, Konogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_154<tab>Ah... Ahem! You wouldn't happen to be that kindly stranger everyone likes and adores? You are, aren't you!? Perhaps you would be willing to do us a teensy little favor? Of course you would!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_154<tab>Also, <var 08 E905 ((liebe Nichtzwergin)) ((lieber Nichtzwerg)) /var>. Wie können wir dir<var 1D /var>... Ich meine, wie kannst du uns helfen?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_155<tab>My brother and I are conducting some highly secret research at the moment, but we've hit a dead end. To continue, we need to get our hands on an automaton core...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_155<tab>Ganz einfach. Mein Bruder und ich sind Forscher. Und für unsere Forschung brauchen wir <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8FD4020502 /var>. Du kannst uns bestimmt sowas besorgen, oder?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_001<tab>...So I'm to be your patsy?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_002<tab>Good luck with that.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_002<tab>Warum macht ihr das nicht selber?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_157<tab>Oh, don't be silly! Everyone knows you're the soul of generosity! A sinner who cannot help but render aid to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fellow sinner in their hour of need! Not for fame or fortune or any other reward, but simply for the joy of it! Am I wrong?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_157<tab>Führ uns nicht am Bart herum. Wir wissen es: Du bist <var 08 E905 ((die Nichtzwergin, die)) ((der Nichtzwerg, der)) /var> so gerne anderen hilft. Also wirst du auch uns helfen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q4_000_000<tab>Hilfst du den Zwergenzwillingen Anogg und Konogg?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A4_000_001<tab>...This is another one of those moments where it really doesn't matter what I have to say, isn't it?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A4_000_002<tab>Oh, sod this.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_159<tab>How rude!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_159<tab>Was? Wie kann man nur so kleinlich sein!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_160<tab>So rude!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_160<tab>Wir mögen kleine Zwerge sein, aber du, du bist <var 1A 02 /var>kleinlich<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_161<tab>But despite your vehement refusal, deep down we both know you cannot help but aid us in our endeavor. 'Tis your nature. We will pretend that you agreed without a fuss and that will be the end of it.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_161<tab>Oder ist es so, dass du uns eigentlich doch helfen wirst? Du wolltest nur einen Witz machen. Dann verzeihen wir dir.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_162<tab>Now you're on the trolley.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_162<tab><var 08 E905 ((Sie)) ((Er)) /var> ist es wirklich. <var 08 E905 ((Die Nichtzwergin)) ((Der Nichtzwerg)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> allen hilft.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_163<tab>The core we require is being stored with other sundry materials on the cliffs above us. Once you have it, bring it to my sister.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_163<tab>Hurra! Mit <var 08 E905 ((ihrem)) ((seinem)) /var> Schweigen hat <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> zugestimmt! Also, du findest den Eisenbartkern den Berg hoch auf einem Gerümpelhaufen. Wir warten, <var 08 E905 ((Nichtzwergin)) ((Nichtzwerg)) /var>, wir warten.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_165<tab>As soon as you have that automaton core, bring it to me straightaway.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_165<tab>Hast du den Eisenbartkern? Nein? Dann hol ihn doch bitte.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_170<tab>Don't dally, sinner! We need that core for our research!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_170<tab>Du findest den Eisenbartkern oben auf einem Gerümpelhaufen. Ich bin mir ganz sicher.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_180<tab>Can't you see we're in the middle of a very important conversation?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_180<tab>Siehst du nicht, dass wir uns in einer Lagebesprechung befinden?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_200<tab>You gave 'em the ol' lali-bleeding-ho, did you? Hope they took it to heart.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_200<tab>Was ist? Lassen die beiden dich etwas für sie schuften?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_250<tab>Ahh, there's the sinner now!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_251<tab>And is that the core I spy in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> hot little hands?

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_252<tab>Heh heh heh, brilliant! All we've got to do is sell this for a small fortune, and then we'll be one step closer to seeing our plans for world domination to fruition...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_252<tab>Dann hast du dir auch ein kleines Taschengeld verdient. Und wir sind unserem Ziel einen Schritt näher gekommen: der Weltherrschaft!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_253<tab>(Oi, Anogg! Lali-nay on the domination-ho!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_253<tab>Pssst, Anogg! Das darfst du doch nicht verraten!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_254<tab>(Oh, right! That was a close one, Brother!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_254<tab>Stimmt eigentlich. Du bist wirklich klug, Konogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_255<tab>Now then, for our next request...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_255<tab>Übrigens hätten wir da noch eine Bitte an dich.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_256<tab>Lali-what in the hells are you two up to-ho!? If you're even thinking of taking advantage of this good sinner, I'll tan both your hides and toss you from the top of White Oil Falls! Now get you gone!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_256<tab>Was macht ihr denn da!!! Lasst ihr <var 08 E905 ((die Besucherin)) ((den Besucher)) /var> für euch schuften? Das gehört sich nicht.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_257<tab>(-Anogg and Konogg-)Sir, yes, sir!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_257<tab>(-Anogg und Konogg-)Uaaaah! Der strenge Vorarbeiter! Der wird uns vierteilen und ins Meer werfen lassen!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_258<tab>Sorry about that. They don't know any better, on account of them being all on their own. No parents.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_258<tab>Tut mir leid wegen denen. Sie wissen nicht, was sich gehört.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_259<tab>They've lost more than most, you could say. More than anyone ever should.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_259<tab>Meine Zwerge machen dir ganz schön zu schaffen, was? Bitte sieh es ihnen nach, ihre Bärte sind kurz und ihre Köpfe sind hohl.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_260<tab>Anyway, I've been meaning to ask. Everyone says you're the soul of generosity─a sinner who cannot help but render aid to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fellow sinner in their hour of need. Not for fame or fortune or any other reward, but simply for the joy of it. Am I wrong?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_260<tab>Aber sag, ist es denn so? Bist du hier, um uns Gefallen zu tun, bei der Arbeit zu helfen, unsere Leben leichter zu machen?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A5_000_002<tab>I'd swear you just repeated nearly word for word what those two...never mind.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A5_000_002<tab>Die Zwillinge schienen das zu glauben.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_262<tab>We're short a lantern at the dig site. Should be another in the cave just outside of the village. Mind going and fetching it for me? 'Course you don't.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_262<tab>Aha. Indem du nicht antwortest, stimmst du also zu. Dann lass mich dir sagen, dass es uns an <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8FD5030402 /var> fehlt. In den Höhlen vorm Dorf steht noch eine.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_263<tab>Once you've got it, bring it to me back at the dig. Oh, and don't worry─I'll see you compensated for the trouble.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_263<tab>Wenn du sie holst und zum Stollen bringst, werde ich dich dafür bezahlen. Also, ich warte.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_265<tab>Got that lantern for me? No? It should be in the cave just outside of town.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_265<tab>Hast du <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8FD5020502 /var> aus der Höhle vor dem Dorf?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_350<tab>There you are. I presume that lantern you're holding's for yours truly?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_351<tab>Much obliged. Here─a little something for your trouble.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_351<tab>Ja, genau das Richtige. Und hier ist deine Belohnung.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_352<tab>Never let it be said a dwarf of character doesn't pay his debts. Anyway, if we've nothing else to discuss...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_352<tab>Fühlt sich gut an, das Gefühl von Gil in der Tasche, oder? Das war's dann aber schon, was du für mich tun kannst. Ich werde mich jetzt wieder an die Arbeit machen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_353<tab>Just let us pass already!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_354<tab>We want to see the ruins! Please please please please please!?

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_355<tab>No, no, no, no, no. It's dangerous and off-limits and even if I were the sort of man who could be bribed─which I'm not─I'd be shocked if you two had anything valuable enough for me to risk my neck looking the other way.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_355<tab>Nein, nein und noch mal nein. Es ist gefährlich. Deswegen ist der Zutritt ja auch verboten.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_356<tab>Why are you and everyone else so bloody obsessed with trying to get a look at the cavern filled with mysterious machina anyway? It's just a bloody scrap heap, isn't it?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_356<tab>Warum wollt ihr überhaupt da rein? Wir haben die Maschinen ausgebuddelt. Außer denen ist da nichts zu holen.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_357<tab>No no─it's so much more! Based on our research, we have reason to believe that those ruins contain─
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_358<tab>(Hush, Sister! How many times must you nearly give the game away!? It's supposed to be our secret!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_358<tab>Nicht, Anogg! Das ist doch unser Geheimnis!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_359<tab>(Oh, yes, right. Right. It's just so hard sometimes to contain my enthusiasm...)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_359<tab>Ach ja, stimmt, Konogg. Ein Glück, dass du so klug bist.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_360<tab>Nothing. These ruins contain nothing of value whatsoever. We shall leave you to your affairs, honorable guard sir, and bid thee farewell.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_360<tab>Ihr habt's gehört. Wir haben da drinnen nichts verloren. Auf Wieder<var 16 /var>sehen!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_361<tab>Honestly, I'm beginning to hope that there really is nothing of value in there, for all the trouble it's causing. But as I was about to say─if we've got nothing else to discuss, then you'd best be on your way. It's dangerous to wander about an active dig, and I don't want anyone getting hurt.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_361<tab>Also wirklich, das sind vielleicht zwei ... Und dich möchte ich auch bitten, von dem Stollen und den Maschinen fernzubleiben. Sie sind gefährlich und können einen schnell den Bart kosten.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_370<tab>What does it matter to you if we go through? It's not like it's your find! You have nothing to lose!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_371<tab>You really must let us through. It's a matter of the utmost importance!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_371<tab>Der Stollen. Die Maschinen. Wir müssen da rein.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_372<tab>...What in the hells are you two on about?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_372<tab>Was flüstern die beiden denn da nur die ganze Zeit?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_400<tab>Poked around Komra, did you? Learn anything about that big find?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_400<tab>Holladrio! Warst du in Komra? Hast du erfahren, was man da entdeckt hat? Ich muss es einfach wissen!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_401<tab>A machine graveyard, eh? Interesting, interesting... This could be the beginning of a great and grand adventure. Or an utterly nonsensical one─though that does have its appeal on occasion, I'll allow.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_401<tab>Ruinen voller Maschinen? So etwas wie Eisenbärte? Aber drin warst du nicht, ja? Hm, alles sehr interessant, wirklich. Hier, du hast dir eine kleine Stärkung verdient.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_410<tab>Folks ought to keep busy, that's my motto. Idle hands are the fae's playthings.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_410<tab>Wenn wir es geschickt anstellen, werden wir alle reich mit dieser Entdeckung! Nur weiß ich noch nicht, wie.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_411<tab>Wicked white, if you start pestering me like those twins to get inside... <sigh> I tell you, what's the point of being a guard if you can't profit off it? Why would anyone ever take this job?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_411<tab>Zutritt verboten! Ach, wär ich doch nur so wohlhabend wie mein Cousin<var 1D /var>...
